page.title: 13OUT AND ABOUT, THWAITES
page.content: Out and About is our local magazine and it is full of news of the area, a calendar of events and adverts. It was started in June 1984 by two ladies, who live locally, to tell people what things were happening in the area, and so that the village hall would be used more. The Parish Council gave Â£10 to launch it. Since then it has been kept going by donations and small advertisements. The ladies collect up all of the information for this magazine. One of the ladies edits it and it is printed free by a business man. It circulates around all of the Thwaites area and part of Millom. Some people from The Green and The Hill deliver about 200 copies. You do not have to pay for it. It comes out once a month. People say that events are better supported since Out and About started.
